effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
